name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NZ Transport Agency Waka Kotahi Region Delays

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Google Chrome extension for tracking region delays from the official NZ Transport Agency Waka Kotahi (NZTA) Journey Planner feeds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Monitor your region traffic delays provided by the NZ Transport Agency Waka Kotahi Journey Planner.

This plugin allows you to select any number of regions from the NZ Transport Agency Waka Kotahi Journey Planner feeds and be notified at set intervals of any changes to current delays reported in their system. Click on the item and you will be shown a brief overview of the delay with a link to open the item on the official delay page for the full overview.

This was developed for use by the Waze community in New Zealand.
